meanings.definition: Resembling a torch in appearance or function.
meanings.sent1: The bright flames cast a torchlike glow on the dark path.
meanings.sent2: The firefighter carried a torchlike tool to light up the room.
meanings.sent3: The torchlike lantern made the campfire look jealous.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm for the project was a torchlike beacon in the team.
meanings.sent5: The torchlike beam of light pierced through the fog, guiding them home.
